name: RACCOON LAUNDERING
description:
set the mood by listening to Herb Ellis & Remo Palmer's Windflower while playing the game :)

created for the Bitsy Secret Santa for Violet

based on keywords washing, raccoon, and tanuki leaf

using bipsi, a bitsy-like tool developed by candle

special thanks to kev for staying up playtesting this game with me

it's the last day of the school year in this university. students are finishing up their finals projects, getting drunk with friends for one last time, packing up to go home, or in your case: doing laundry errands to make some quick extra cash.

little do you know, something very strange is occurring in the shadows of this small dorm building.

there's a total of 6 endings

which one will you get??
